code: import React from"react";import{Navigate}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const VALID_ROLES=new Set(["citizen","registrar","bank"]);function PublicOnlyRoute(_ref){let{children}=_ref;const role=localStorage.getItem("role");const isAuthenticated=role&&VALID_ROLES.has(role);if(isAuthenticated){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/home",replace:true});}return children;}export default PublicOnlyRoute;
